_description: Drug → Company → Brand mapping for Paeon DMR frontend display. All values are human-configured. Do not auto-generate.

cipla.name: Cipla
cipla.overview: Cipla Limited is one of India's leading pharmaceutical companies with a global presence across 80+ countries. Founded in 1935 by Dr. K.A. Hamied, Cipla has pioneered affordable healthcare access for millions worldwide.
cipla.specialties: Respiratory Care • HIV/AIDS Treatment • Oncology • Cardiology • Anti-infectives
cipla.mission: Making healthcare accessible and affordable globally through innovative drug development and sustainable business practices.

pfizer.name: Pfizer
pfizer.overview: Pfizer Inc. is a global biopharmaceutical leader driven by science-based innovation. With a legacy spanning over 170 years, Pfizer develops breakthrough therapies, vaccines, and consumer healthcare products.
pfizer.specialties: Vaccines • Oncology • Cardiology • Immunology • Rare Diseases
pfizer.mission: Breakthroughs that change patients' lives — to discover, develop, and deliver innovative medicines and vaccines.

jnj.name: Johnson & Johnson
jnj.overview: Johnson & Johnson is a diversified healthcare company and one of the world's largest, with operations in pharmaceuticals, medical devices, and consumer health across 60+ countries.
jnj.specialties: Oncology • Immunology • Cardiovascular • Neuroscience • Medical Devices
jnj.mission: To profoundly change the trajectory of health for humanity through bold innovation and compassionate care.

emcure.name: Emcure Pharmaceuticals
emcure.overview: Emcure Pharmaceuticals is a leading Indian pharmaceutical company with a strong focus on complex therapies including oncology, gynecology, critical care, and biologics.
emcure.specialties: Oncology • Gynecology • Critical Care • Biologics • HIV/AIDS
emcure.mission: To develop and deliver affordable, high-quality medicines through innovation, science, and patient-centric research.

sunpharma.name: Sun Pharma
sunpharma.overview: Sun Pharmaceutical Industries is India's largest and the world's fourth-largest specialty generic pharmaceutical company, with a presence in over 100 countries.
sunpharma.mission: Reaching people, touching lives — providing high-quality, affordable medicines to patients worldwide.

drreddy.name: Dr. Reddy's Laboratories
drreddy.overview: Dr. Reddy's Laboratories is a leading Indian multinational pharmaceutical company committed to generics, biosimilars, and innovative drug development across global markets.
drreddy.mission: Good Health Can't Wait — accelerating access to affordable and innovative medicines globally.

lupin.name: Lupin
lupin.overview: Lupin Limited is a global pharmaceutical company headquartered in Mumbai, India, with a strong focus on respiratory, cardiovascular, anti-infective, and diabetes therapies.
lupin.mission: Caring for health by delivering high-quality, affordable medicines globally through scientific innovation.

astrazeneca.name: AstraZeneca
astrazeneca.overview: AstraZeneca is a global, science-led biopharmaceutical company focused on the discovery, development, and commercialization of prescription medicines in oncology, respiratory, cardiovascular, and immunology.
astrazeneca.mission: Pushing the boundaries of science to deliver life-changing medicines that transform patient outcomes worldwide.

brand.tagline: Driven by innovation. Powered by science.
